metadata.title: Advanced Camera Movements - Veo 3 Prompts
metadata.description: Professional camera movement techniques for dynamic Veo 3 video generation

prompt_templates.name: Smooth Dolly Track
prompt_templates.description: Horizontal camera movement parallel to subject, creates professional cinematic feel

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Stabilized movement, consistent speed, professional tracking
prompt_structure.movement_parameters: Speed: slow/medium/fast, Distance: close/medium/wide, Direction: left/right/forward/back

examples.prompt: Smooth dolly track left following a cyclist through city streets, medium speed, medium distance, rack focus from background to subject, stabilized movement, consistent speed, professional tracking
examples.expected_result: Dynamic following shot with professional feel

examples.prompt: Smooth dolly track forward approaching a chef plating food, slow speed, close distance, maintaining sharp focus on hands, stabilized movement, consistent speed, professional tracking

best_practices: Use rack focus for dramatic effect
Ensure smooth start and end points
common_mistakes: Too fast speed losing cinematic quality

prompt_templates.name: Cinematic Crane Shot
prompt_templates.description: Vertical camera movement revealing or concealing scene elements

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Smooth vertical movement, controlled arc, dramatic reveal
prompt_structure.movement_parameters: Direction: rising/descending, Arc: straight/curved, Speed: slow/medium for drama

examples.prompt: Cinematic crane shot rising, revealing sprawling cityscape from rooftop perspective, curved arc movement, slow speed, smooth vertical movement, controlled arc, dramatic reveal
Cinematic crane shot descending, revealing secret garden through tree canopy, straight arc movement, medium speed, smooth vertical movement, controlled arc, dramatic reveal

best_practices: Use for dramatic reveals or conclusions
common_mistakes: Poor framing at start or end points

prompt_templates.name: 360-Degree Orbit
prompt_templates.description: Camera revolves around subject maintaining focus, creates dynamic showcase effect

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Consistent distance, smooth rotation, stable horizon
prompt_structure.movement_parameters: Radius: tight/medium/wide, Speed: slow/medium, Focus: center subject

examples.prompt: 360-degree orbit around luxury sports car, medium radius, slow speed, maintaining focus on vehicle profile, consistent distance, smooth rotation, stable horizon
examples.expected_result: Complete product view with dramatic flair

examples.prompt: 360-degree orbit around dancing couple in ballroom, wide radius, medium speed, maintaining focus on dancers, consistent distance, smooth rotation, stable horizon

best_practices: Use for product or performance showcases
common_mistakes: Too fast speed causing motion sickness

prompt_templates.name: Push-In Focus Pull
prompt_templates.description: Camera moves toward subject while adjusting focus for dramatic emphasis

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Smooth approach, precise focus timing, emotional build-up
prompt_structure.movement_parameters: Start: wide/medium, End: close/extreme close, Transition: gradual/snap

examples.prompt: Push-in focus pull toward actor's emotional reaction, medium distance to extreme close-up, gradual focus transition, smooth approach, precise focus timing, emotional build-up
Push-in focus pull toward product detail, wide distance to macro close-up, snap focus transition, smooth approach, precise focus timing, emotional build-up

best_practices: Time focus pull with narrative peak
Ensure sharp focus at end point
common_mistakes: Poor focus timing missing dramatic moment

technical_guidelines.stabilization_notes: Always specify stabilized movement for professional quality

focus_techniques.snap_focus: Quick focus change for dramatic effect

combination_suggestions.movement_plus_audio: Sync with audio cues or musical beats

usage_notes.narrative_integration: Choose movements that support story beats
usage_notes.post_production: Plan for color correction and stabilization needs
